headline: AI Startup Challenges Arista, Nvidia, Cisco In Leading Edge Networking
summary: Nvidia stock has struggled in 2025. Now new competition in networking is coming from startup Nexthop AI, founded by former Arista COO.

headline: BCE's Bell Media Expands Globally, Buys Majority Stake in Sphere Abacus
summary: BCE's subsidiary, Bell Media, strengthens its global content distribution business by acquiring a majority stake in Sphere Abacus.
